{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3411596,"name":"Guilherme Samuel","username":"megarubber","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/megarubber/{size}/172063_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-27T17:46:29.937Z","cooked":"

When I open Driver Station and use the wireless robot connection, no communication is found. Network (Ethernet) cable directly on computer returns the same. The USB-B port, if it connects, Driver Station returns “Team USB” instead of my team’s number.

I supose that it isn’t a problem in RoboRIO because other PC with Driver Stations works without issues (I already tested it without Firewall and disabled network adapters).

Some tips to solve this?

IMG-20240727-WA00011308×325 63.3 KB

In the setting, what did you input as the team number?
